verses.text: OUR peerless king of glory, On his triumphant throne; We bring our songs before thee, We're by thy mercy known.
We love to sing his praises And tell the stories bold, Of him who from dwelling In God's own fold.
O Saviour blessed Saviour, Whose love is thy crown; We worship now before thee, While hosts thy feet bow down.

chorus.text: We sing, we sing The praise of our king; We sing, we sing The glo-ry of our king.
